title: Eric Prydz @ Ultra Music Festival 2014 Video (HD 720p)
description:
Swedish producer Eric Prydz took to the main stage just after 8.30pm on Friday night to unveil his hugely-anticipated new 'HOLO' show during Day One of Ultra Music Festival.

In what would be one of the most mind-blowing sets at MiamiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Bayfront Park, full-colour lasers shot out across the crowd from the very first second of the dance heavyweightÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s performance.

What was supposed to be the debut of PrydzÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new Ã¢â‚¬ËœHOLOÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ live show, promised to be the "largest holographic" in North America (see update below) the set still fused the 37-year-old's music with custom-designed visuals which bounced within the main stage's 'Vortex' structure.

A massive LED screen lit up with PrydzÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s own digital creations, as the Swede spun through his biggest hits, including crowd-favourites Ã¢â‚¬ËœLiberate,Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ and Ã¢â‚¬ËœEvery Day.'

Fireworks shot into the sky as he rounded out the set with his undoubtedly biggest hit, Ã¢â‚¬ËœPjanoo,Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ with the crowd throwing up their hands in an almost trance-like devotion.

For true Prydz fans, the show was a solid. And for those just in town for the Ã¢â‚¬Å“EDMÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ it was probably just as cool.
